title: Is Medium good for blogging? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think Medium is just a tool, like any other tool. It has certainly increased my visibility with the articles I have written there. I’ve seen new life on articles I wrote back in the early 2000’s and I love the “curated” option where Medium lists where the article first appeared. I’ve seen new audience members come into my own business website. So, it does help to generate traffic. I do find it interesting that most people don’t understand the appreciation system of “claps” to essentially vote on a story. I try to give very generous amounts of claps on articles I really enjoy. I try to write something for Medium at least once a month, but I most likely will be writing more often.

Yes. Although, it’s popularity levels are decreasing. I still think Medium is great if you’re not willing to purchase your own domain. Medium is great if you get loads of claps, meaning you can probably make some money. It’s nice to read other people’s posts if you’re willing to splurge five bucks a month. Although Medium has some features that users don’t love, which is why I would recommend Bawler: http://bawler.seunite.com/ a new social network for written content and podcasts, that’s completely free, unrestricted, and fresh.
